title: I made a "You're already dead." Mordekaiser emote
body:
https://imgur.com/U0KhqfI

Touch-up of an fanart I made earlier.
Tried to post on the league reddit but apparently they insta-delete it even when I follow the posting rules. Oh well.
{{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:82}}

replies.body: "You are already bugged"*
how did you done this ?
Used a Zalgo Text Generator. Should be the first result if you google it.
Thanks mate ^o^

please post this in report a bug since its about mordekaiser.
also while at it... if you use the emote, will a random different emote/sticker appear? you know because morde is as buggy as the first pokemon generation.

No, the emote will appear after a delay if you try to use it while simultaneously QSSing and attacking a blast cone.

It might not appear at all.
Nah, if you use it while activating {{item:3142}}, it will temporarilly body block champion's pathing.
If you're under the effects of Janna's shield and Sterak's shield and your E is on cooldown, your W will be castable on enemies
I can totally see this being used as you've just ulted someone and are waiting for it to tick to their death. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2018-04-05T23:12:11.812+0000)
>
> I can totally see this being used as you've just ulted someone and are waiting for it to tick to their death. :P

Ayyy so many people die to Morde's ult as they run off.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I normally see people surviving it more than dying to it, just because they drank a potion  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

{{item:3151}} {{item:3116}} 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

5.7k gold later :( 

Early fights before those items though, you just get countered by simple 50g potions, it feels so bad
50%/50% was better than 25%/75% :/
Yeah, it was way better! We also used to have a lot more range on his ult as well
Started in season 3. Morde was my first main. Brand was my second. Malz was my third. I like to watch people die long after I've continued to pursue them. That being said, I need this.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2018-04-05T23:12:11.812+0000)
>
> I can totally see this being used as you've just ulted someone and are waiting for it to tick to their death. :P

Some less popular champions emotes are always appreciated if not entirely Financially viable
Nani?
\*ear rape*
XD this is great but sadly riot only makes emotes for popular champs

Nonsense, they make emotes from some unpopular ones.

They just bundle it with 7 others and force you to buy everything or nothing at all.
There's a wukong emote?
Wow I've never seen that emote be used ever. Infact I usually end up seeing the same 4 emotes be used over and over.
I think this fits Zed better

> [{quoted}](name=NA Darklarik,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-04-04T21:15:19.080+0000)
>
> I think this fits Zed better

Maybe, but I feel this way when I ult + ignite a low HP champ on {{champion:82}} lol
{{champion:40}}{{champion:117}} {{champion:43}}  can easily stop that especially if they have life steal. Worst part is, they're very common.

> [{quoted}](name=Kelg,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2018-04-04T21:22:26.536+0000)
>
> Maybe, but I feel this way when I ult + ignite a low HP champ on {{champion:82}} lol

It lacks the explosion which makes it the meme.
Might as well put it on zoe with a extremely MANLY face so you can put it up when you have hit your bubble as well.
It's weird when I enter a Mordekaiser thread that isn't made by MM.

> [{quoted}](name=Chromatic Eagle,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2018-04-04T23:11:59.437+0000)
>
> It's weird when I enter a Mordekaiser thread that isn't made by MM.

He's not the only Main

lol, stop trolling people MM. We all know this is your NA account.

######</s>

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=000b00000000,timestamp=2018-04-06T01:09:29.339+0000)
>
> lol, stop trolling people MM. We all know this is your NA account.
> 
> ######</s>

While I can say that it wouldn't be the 1 st time people have accused me of being one and the same.  
This is the 1 st time with sarcasm.  Also MMs NA account is "Delicious Metal"

I'm just a Season 1 veteran Morde main.
Yeah there's at least three of them!

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=000b00000001,timestamp=2018-04-06T02:26:48.038+0000)
>
> Yeah there's at least three of them!

On the boards there are a dozen.  Lots don't frequent here

お前はもう死んでいる。。。。

何⁉

on mai wa mo sin de lu ...

NA NI !?!?!?!?
NANI!?
looks ok, still won't pay for an emote w/ rp though.

I would've preferred a fist of the North Star style face on Yasuo because:

Yasuo is a weeb
Yasuo is more tilting

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=UqkcJyAl,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2018-04-06T02:24:55.047+0000)
>
> I would've preferred a fist of the North Star style face on Yasuo because:
> 
> Yasuo is a weeb
> Yasuo is more tilting

yeah but yas has an emote already
omae wa mou shindeiru
Now make a "NANI?!!" Nami emote.

"You are already dead you just havent caught up yet"

                  -Shen {{champion:98}}
dude this is fucking amazing, good job. you kids amaze me with your talents outside this game.
if i was level 30 on this acc id upvote
League subreddit has insanely bullshit rules
